experience.title: Web Developer
description: Rapidly prototype new features and applications, with a focus on the client side using a variety of languages and frameworks
(PHP, Ruby, NodeJS, knockout, angular, JSTL, etc.).
Utilize the Agile methodology to develop and communicate efficiently with team members.
Constantly refactor, optimize, improve scalability and usability, split-test, and target analytics.
Expand and enhance skillset through learning sessions with fellow employees.

experience.title: Web Designer & Developer
description: Worked with a variety of clients designing and developing websites and email marketing campaigns.
I also managed all print design needs.

experience.title: Graphic Designer and Web Developer
description: Work with a variety of clients designing and developing branding, online, marketing and promotional materials.

experience.title: Graphic Design Specialist
description: Worked directly with clients designing print materials from conception through production.
I also worked directly with the in-house press operators.

employment.title: Delivery Coordinator
description: Managed scheduling, loading and delivering of materials.
Assisted customers, resolving their needs and delivery issues.

skills: Proficient in CSS3, HTML5, Javascript, PHP and Ruby
Proficient with KnockoutJS, NodeJS, and Middleman
Proficient with Git, Mercurial and Subversion version control systems
